trek.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a long and difficult journey, made especially on foot as an adventure
trek.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a lonely trek through the forest
trek.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a distance that seems long when you walk it
trek.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I’m afraid it’s a bit of a trek to the station.
trek.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to make a long and difficult journey, especially on foot
trek.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The elevator was broken, so we had to trek up six flights of stairs.
trek.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to walk a long way, especially in the mountains, as an adventure
trek.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: For five days he trekked across the mountains of central China.
